completed_steps.summary: Classified as monorepo with 2 parts: astro-app (web frontend, Astro 5.17 SSG), studio (web CMS admin, Sanity v5.9)
Found 134+ existing docs across root, docs/ (26), tests/ (1), _bmad-output/ (104+), studio/ (1), .github/workflows/ (7)
Tech stack: Astro 5.17 + Sanity v5.9 + Tailwind 4.1 + React 19.2 + fulldev/ui + Storybook 10 + Vitest 3.2 + Playwright 1.58
Exhaustive analysis: 507 component files, 12 custom blocks, ~100 UI variants, ~39 UI primitives, 22 schema types, 3 GROQ queries
Source tree documented with all critical folders and 8 entry points annotated
Dev/deployment guides: Docker + native setup, 7 CI/CD workflows, Conventional Commits, Cloudflare Pages deployment
Integration architecture: 5 integration points (content delivery, visual editing, schema sharing/TypeGen, shared deps, CI/CD)
Architecture doc written covering system design, block lifecycle, template system, data architecture, design system, testing, deployment
All supporting docs written: project-overview, component-inventory, data-models, development-guide, source-tree-analysis
Master index generated with links to 7 generated docs + 30+ existing docs organized by category
Validation complete: no incomplete markers found, all files verified on disk

findings.technology_stack: Astro 5.17 + Sanity v5.9 + Tailwind 4.1 + React 19.2 + fulldev/ui + Storybook 10 + Vitest 3.2 + Playwright 1.58
findings.components: 507 total: 12 custom blocks, ~100 UI variants, ~39 UI primitives, 7 layout, 5 templates
findings.schemas: 22 types: 3 documents (page, siteSettings, sponsor), 11 blocks, 8 objects
findings.tests: 19 unit/component tests, 19 integration tests (241 cases), 4 E2E specs (34 cases, 5 browser projects)
findings.integration_points: Content delivery (GROQ API), Visual editing (Presentation Tool), Schema sharing (TypeGen), Shared deps (npm workspaces), CI/CD (7 GitHub Actions workflows)
findings.ci_cd: 7 workflows: CI, release, storybook deploy, sanity deploy, sync preview, 2 branch enforcement
